trans-unit.source: Represents the margins for various chart elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示各種圖表項目的邊界。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Top margin.
trans-unit.target: 上邊界。

trans-unit.source: Bottom margin.
trans-unit.target: 下邊界。

trans-unit.source: Left margin.
trans-unit.target: 左邊界。

trans-unit.source: Right margin.
trans-unit.target: 右邊界。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> class with the specified top, bottom, left and right coordinates of the margin.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的上、下、左、右邊界座標來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bottom margin.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定下邊界。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的物件是否等於目前的物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the specified object is equal to the current object, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的物件等於目前的物件，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> 物件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the hash code for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> 物件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the margins are empty.
trans-unit.target: 判斷邊界是否空白。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if all margins values are zero, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有的邊界值都是零，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the left margin.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定左邊界。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the right margin.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定右邊界。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the top margin.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定上邊界。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="integer" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: When used for legend cells, the margins are measured as a percentage of the legend's font size.
trans-unit.target: 當用於圖例資料格，邊界會測量以圖例字型大小的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> object to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> 物件轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="RectangleF" /> object that has margins.
trans-unit.target: 具有邊界的 <see cref="RectangleF" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> object to its <see langword="string" /> representation.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins" /> 物件轉換成其 <see langword="string" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents this object.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個物件的 <see langword="string" /> 值。
